name: Journey of Life (itch) (Dsun_42)
description:
This is  a story based game made in 8hr based on the theme An end is the nee Beginning. This game shows how the end of the each phase of the life lead to new beginning of the another phase in life. It depicts how as we enter in new phase of life the things that gives us actual happiness decreases and in the end nothing matters but the memories.....

Gameplay is not much but hope you enjoy the story!!!!
